00020 #ifndef BOOST_XINT_INCLUDED_BITQUEUET_HPP
00021 #define BOOST_XINT_INCLUDED_BITQUEUET_HPP
00022 
00024 namespace boost {
00025 namespace xint {
00026 namespace detail {
00027 
00029 class bitqueue_t {
00030     public:
00031     bitqueue_t(): bits_pending(0) { }
00032     void push(doubledigit_t bits, size_t count);
00033     doubledigit_t pop(size_t requestedbits);
00034     bool empty() const { return pending.empty(); }
00035     size_t size() const { return bits_pending; }
00036 
00037     private:
00038     static const size_t ddbits = std::numeric_limits<doubledigit_t>::digits;
00039     typedef std::pair<doubledigit_t, size_t> indata_t;
00040     typedef std::queue<indata_t> inqueue_t;
00041 
00042     size_t bits_pending;
00043     inqueue_t pending;
00044 };
00045 
00046 inline void bitqueue_t::push(doubledigit_t bits, size_t count) {
00047     if (count < ddbits) {
00048         doubledigit_t mask = (doubledigit_t(1) << count) - 1;
00049         bits &= mask;
00050     }
00051 
00052     if (pending.empty()) {
00053         pending.push(std::make_pair(bits, count));
00054     } else {
00055         indata_t &n(pending.back());
00056         if (n.second + count <= ddbits) {
00057             n.first |= bits << n.second;
00058             n.second += count;
00059         } else {
00060             pending.push(std::make_pair(bits, count));
00061         }
00062     }
00063     bits_pending += count;
00064 }
00065 
00066 inline doubledigit_t bitqueue_t::pop(size_t requestedbits) {
00067     doubledigit_t buffer = 0;
00068     size_t bits_in_buffer = 0;
00069     while (bits_in_buffer < requestedbits && !pending.empty()) {
00070         indata_t &n(pending.front());
00071         size_t maxbits = requestedbits - bits_in_buffer, actualbits =
00072             (std::min)(n.second, maxbits);
00073         buffer |= (n.first << bits_in_buffer);
00074 
00075         n.first >>= actualbits;
00076         n.second -= actualbits;
00077         bits_in_buffer += actualbits;
00078         bits_pending -= actualbits;
00079 
00080         if (n.second == 0) pending.pop();
00081     }
00082     return (buffer & ((doubledigit_t(1) << requestedbits) - 1));
00083 }
00084 
00085 } // namespace detail
00086 } // namespace xint
00087 } // namespace boost
00089 
00090 #endif // BOOST_XINT_INCLUDED_BITQUEUET_HPP
